main event: A UFO sighting involving an elongated star-shaped object with a glint was reported near Wake Island.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 25 minutes, The object first appeared as a bright white light and then changed to red, The object was described as being quite large compared to the observers, The course of the object was stationary and eastward, Military personnel were the primary witnesses with no photographs available.
sighted object: elongated star-shaped object with surrounding glint
witness description: Military personnel including 1st Lt. William P. Schroeder and Capt. Eugene Hill, USAF
